channel.title: "Other Games" Tournament What Would You Like To Play?
channel.description:
Well since its just generally minigolf for whatever reason, maybe we should try doing a different game? I just put a select few from the Playforia site. We could even use Funorb or other sites like that if you wanted a like Arcanist tournament or something I don't know its up to you guys. We can just do another minigolf one if you would like, but I would like to see what you all think.
Also feel free to discuss how these should be played and how pairing up players should be took care of etc.

item.title: "Other Games" Tournament What Would You Like To Play?
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

I know chess isn’t the same, but I was just posting random ideas I could think of to play. But either way it will be up to how we vote than coming up with the rules and such.

Read full topic
item.source: "Other Games" Tournament What Would You Like To Play?

item.title: "Other Games" Tournament What Would You Like To Play?
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Chess OR 8-ball. Chess shouldn’t be in the same category as a game such as 8-ball or minigolf, because it’s totally different concept.

Read full topic
item.source: "Other Games" Tournament What Would You Like To Play?
